definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: The topline is level from the withers to the base of tail.
sentences.chinese: 從馬肩隆到尾根處平直。

sentences.english: Altered from straightness or original position.
sentences.chinese: 改變平直或者原有的形狀。

sentences.english: Bend forward slightly at the hip, keeping your back straight, until you feel a slight stretch in your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 保持背部平直慢慢俯身，直到感覺腿筋拉緊。

sentences.english: Sometimes allowance for the curvature of the trajectory was made by "sighting by the line of metal."
sentences.chinese: 有時會以“炮身瞄準“方式來補償不平直的彈道。

sentences.english: With flexible and convenient operations. the surfaces processed with the machine appear smooth and straight.
sentences.chinese: 全機使用靈活輕便，加工面光滑平直。

sentences.english: One of the characteristics of the breed is the plumed tail, which lies flat and straight on the back.
sentences.chinese: 該品種的特點之一是羽毛尾巴，這就是平直的背部。

sentences.english: The GSD muzzle is straight in profile, with a predominantly black nose.
sentences.chinese: GSD槍口是平直的在外形，與一個主要地黑鼻子。

sentences.english: Straight life insipid, flavors and taste of life twists and turns.
sentences.chinese: 平直的生活淡而無味，曲折的生活五味俱全。

sentences.english: Her tone was flat as a tax collector's.
sentences.chinese: 她的語調象收稅員一樣的平直。

sentences.english: Its tail is also straight, not sticking up like a dog, and its ears are upright.
sentences.chinese: 它的尾巴是平直下垂的，不像狗的尾巴那樣會向上翹。

sentences.english: Residual stress is the main factor affecting the flatness of plate.
sentences.chinese: 殘餘應力是影響矯後中厚板平直度的主要因素。

sentences.english: Regarding to ATOP project, we have no equipment for flatness measurement test.
sentences.chinese: 關於金盛項目，我們有沒有設備平直度測量試驗。

sentences.english: The straight plate cutter is the plate processing important equipment.
sentences.chinese: 鋼板平直剪板機是板材加工的重要設備。

sentences.english: It is used for cutting conveyer belt and unbalance ends of belt.
sentences.chinese: 割帶機是用來切斷輸送帶和切割不平直的皮帶端頭。

sentences.english: It can also be obtained in clear, straight-grained pieces having very few defects.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以得到清晰，平直度的缺陷塊，很少。

sentences.english: The evolution trend of beach near Sheyang River estuary is going to be linear gradually.
sentences.chinese: 河口附近岸灘的演變趨勢是逐漸平直。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
